snippet: The city’s Board of Health voted in favor of a mandatory vaccine for children under age 6.
abstract: New York City Board of Health votes in favor of mandatory flu vaccine for children under age 6 who go to preschool or day care; parents may opt out for medical and religious reasons.
lead_paragraph: The city’s Board of Health voted in favor of a mandatory vaccine for children under age 6.

headline.main: New York City to Require Child Flu Shots
headline.print_headline: City Will Require Child Flu Shots
